TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi sealed AxHost/AboutBoxDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

summary.span: 表示将显示 ActiveX 控件的“关于”对话框的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will display an ActiveX control's About dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 能够在将 ActiveX 控件的关于框中显示时得到通知。The provides you the ability to be notified when the ActiveX control's About box is going to be displayed. 显示关于框之前执行代码添加到委托方法。Code added to the delegate method is executed before the About box is displayed. 当你创建委托时，标识将处理 ActiveX 控件的关于对话框的显示，如果有的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the display of an ActiveX control's About dialog box if it has one. 若要将方法与您的处理程序关联，添加到方法的委托的实例。To associate the method with your handler, add an instance of the delegate to the method. 除非移除了该委托，称为每当调用方法时，该处理程序。The handler is called whenever the method is called, unless you remove the delegate. 有关委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例重写构造函数中，并并方法的派生的类包装 Microsoft 屏蔽编辑 ActiveX 控件。The following example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此代码假定已通过运行 AxImp.exe MSMask32.ocx 文件上创建生成的源代码`/source`开关来生成包装器类，以便对其进行编辑。This code assumes you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此代码将仅显示在 C# 语法中，它是作为唯一的语言输出由 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax as that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]
